mapper.select: select * from product where pIsTransaction=false order by product_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pName, pCategory, pPrice, userNickname, pLocation, pLocation2, pDate, pIsTransaction, pImage, pExplain) VALUES (#{pName},#{pCategory},#{pPrice}, #{userNickname},#{pLocation},#{pLocation2},#{pDate}, #{pIsTransaction},#{pImage},#{pExplain});
mapper.select: select `product_num`, `pName`, `pCategory`, `pPrice`, `userNickname`, `pLocation`, `pDate`, `pIsTransaction`, `pImage`, `pExplain` from product where userNickname = #{userNickname} order by product_num desc;
mapper.update: update product set pName=#{pName}, pCategory=#{pCategory}, pExplain=#{pExplain}, pPrice=#{pPrice}, pLocation=#{pLocation}, pLocation2=#{pLocation2}, pImage=#{pImage} where product_num = ${product_num}
